Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs. I believe it will greatly enhance your experience and bring value to your life. Considering its exceptional quality and features, I am offering it to you for $95. This is an exclusive opportunity tailored just for you, and I hope you'll find this offer compelling. Please let me know if you have any questions or need more information about the product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $95. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $95
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
